full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I BKA' DRIN GSOL 'DEBS SOGS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,CES SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAndI TA NO MON KHANG LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG DAD BCAS PA CIG DGOS ZHES DPON AER TE NI CHING DBANG DANG, ,GRVA TSANG GSUM GYI SLOB DPON GRVA RIGS, PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG ,DBUS TZENG THO YON, AA CHI THU DAR RGAN NANG SO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS SMRAS PA'O,, ,,
